content.html: indeed, everything starts out as miscellaneous and then a slow trickle to layers deeper in the onion. Usually for me f2f interaction, or online 1on1 interaction over a longer period is a trigger.
content.text: indeed, everything starts out as miscellaneous and then a slow trickle to layers deeper in the onion. Usually for me f2f interaction, or online 1on1 interaction over a longer period is a trigger.
